APPLICATION HELP: 
 How many times have you been at home with nothing to do? 
 You'd like to read a book, but you don't know which one... Or maybe a movie or a TV show... 
 iMedia is a social application where you can search all kind of multimedia, see a summary of the media and people opinions. You can even rate a movie or show and give your own opinion. 
 And even more, if you want to add your own book, song or whatever you can create a new item for the app so everyoe can see ir and review it.
 
 HOW TO USE IT:
 After registering as an app user, you have your library where every element you've seen, rated, commented even if they are movies, books, music or TV shows. 
 On the other hand, you can search for any item of the database, select it and see its card. 
 Oh! And if you can't find what you're looking for, you can always add a new card whenever you want!

IMedia v1.0 (beta) 
 date: 2013 
 Authors:

 - Enrique García Gutierrez
 - Sergio Ruiz Peña 


 Thank you for using our app
